entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -31.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 12:13 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -31.3°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 52 %

Dewpoint: -38.0°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 29.
